SELECT G.UUID as "id", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = G.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( G.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( G.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", G.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", G.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", G.VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", G.VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", G.COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", G.REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code= G.STATUS) as "status", G.STATUS as "approveState", G.APPLY_ID as "applyId", G.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", G.VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", G.VALID as "valId", G.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" , D.APPROVE_NODE as "approveNode", TO_CHAR( D.APPROVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "approveDate", TO_CHAR( D.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "approveCreateDate", D.ID as "wlApproveId" , E.APPROVE_USER as "approveUserId" from TB_YSZX_IDEA G LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPLY AY1 ON AY1.ID = G.APPLY_ID AND AY1.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE D ON D.ID = AY1.APPROVE_ID AND D.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_AUDIT_USER E ON E.APPROVE_ID = D.ID AND E.VALID = '1'
where G.VALID='1' and G.APPLY_ID is not null AND D.APPROVE_STATUS='0' AND D.AUDIT_FLAG='1' AND D.ID IS NOT NULL
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{pridept}||'%'
and E.APPROVE_USER like '%'||#{approveUserId}||'%'
and G.CONTACT_USER like '%'||#{contactUserName}||'%'
and G.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
ORDER BY G.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS "countNum" from()
mapper.sql:
SELECT G.UUID as "id", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = G.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( G.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( G.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", G.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", G.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", G.VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", G.VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", G.COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", G.REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code= G.STATUS) as "status", (SELECT SORT_ID FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code= G.STATUS) as "sortId", G.STATUS as "approveState", G.APPLY_ID as "applyId", G.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", G.VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", G.VALID as "valId", G.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" , D.APPROVE_NODE as "approveNode", D.ID as "wlApproveId" , D.NEXT_APPROVE_ID as "nextwlApproveId" , D.APPROVE_STEP as "approveStep", TO_CHAR( D.APPROVE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "approveDate", TO_CHAR( D.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "approveCreateDate", E.APPROVE_USER as "approveUserId" from TB_YSZX_IDEA G LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPLY C ON C.ID = G.APPLY_ID AND C.VALID = '1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_APPROVE D ON G.APPLY_ID=D.APPLY_ID AND D.VALID='1' LEFT JOIN TB_WL_AUDIT_USER E ON D.ID=E.APPROVE_ID AND E.VALID='1'
where G.VALID='1' and G.STATUS!='RETURN' and G.APPLY_ID is not null AND D.APPROVE_STATUS='1' AND D.AUDIT_FLAG='1' AND D.ID IS NOT NULL
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{pridept}||'%'
and E.APPROVE_USER like '%'||#{approveUserId}||'%'
and G.CONTACT_USER like '%'||#{contactUserName}||'%'
and G.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
ORDER BY G.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS "countNum" from()
mapper.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as "rn", G.UUID as "id", ( SELECT wm_concat( D.USERALISA) from TB_YSZX_COMPANY_LEADER T LEFT JOIN TB_YSZX_CONFIG_COMPANY_LEADER D ON T.USERID =D.ID where T.VALID='1' AND D.VALID='1' AND T.IDEAID =G.UUID GROUP BY T.IDEAID ) AS "leaderInfo", ( SELECT wm_concat( D.USERALIAS||'('||D.POSTNAME ||')') from TB_YSZX_COMPANY_USER T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER D ON T.USERID =D.USERID where T.VALID='1' AND D.VALID='1' AND T.IDEAID =G.UUID GROUP BY T.IDEAID ) AS "userInfo", ( SELECT wm_concat(T.USERNAME||'('|| T.POSITION ||'、'||D.NAME||')') FROM TB_YSZX_VISIT T LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY D ON T.USERLEVEL =D.CODE where T.VALID='1' AND D.VAILD='1' AND D.PCODE='visitunit_levle' AND T.IDEAID =G.UUID GROUP BY T.IDEAID ) AS "visitInfo", (SELECT DEPTNAME FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPTID = G.APPLY_DEPT) as "applyDept", TO_CHAR( G.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "stateDate", TO_CHAR( G.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "endDate", G.CONTACT_USER as "contactUser", G.CONTACT_PHONE as "contactPhone", G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE as "visitUnitType", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='visitunit_type' and vaild=1 and code= G.VISIT_UNIT_TYPE) as "visitUnitTypeName", G.VISIT_UNIT_NAME as "visitUnitName", G.VISITOR_NUMBER as "visitorNumber", G.COMPANY_USER_NUMBER as "companyUserNumber", G.REMARK as "remark", (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='YSZX_APPROVE_STATE' and vaild=1 and code=G.STATUS) as "status", G.STATUS as "approveState", G.APPLY_ID as "applyId", G.APPLY_NUMBER as "applyNumber", G.VISIT_LEVEL as "visitLevel", G.VALID as "valId", G.CREATE_USER as "createUser", TO_CHAR( G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createTime" FROM TB_YSZX_IDEA G WHERE G.VALID = '1'
AND G.APPLY_DEPT IN
#{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and TO_CHAR(G.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY') like '%'||#{year}||'%'
and TO_CHAR(G.CREATE_TIME,'MM') like '%'||#{month}||'%'
and G.APPLY_NUMBER like '%'||#{applyNumber}||'%'
and G.APPLY_DEPT like '%'||#{applyDept}||'%'
) where 1=1
and "visitInfo" like '%'||#{visitName}||'%'
and "visitInfo" like '%'||#{visitLevel}||'%'
AND "id" IN
#{id123,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT USERID as "userId", USERNAME as "userName", USERALIAS as "userAlias", HRDEPTNAME as "hrDeptName", HRDEPTCODE as "hrDeptCode", POSTCODE as "postCode", POSTNAME as "postName" FROM BG_SYS_USER WHERE USERID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT USERID as "userId", USERNAME as "userName", USERALIAS as "userAlias", HRDEPTNAME as "hrDeptName", HRDEPTCODE as "hrDeptCode", POSTCODE as "postCode", POSTNAME as "postName" FROM BG_SYS_USER WHERE HRCODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT T.NODE, G.ROLE_NAME, G.ROLE_CODE, G.ID FROM TB_WL_RULE T LEFT JOIN TB_PRIV_ROLE G ON T.APPROVE_ROLE=G.ID where G.VALID='1' AND T.VALID ='1' AND T.APPROVE_ROLE IS not NULL AND T.NODE=#{applyStatus}

SELECT T.ID as "id", T.USER_ID as "userId", U.USERNAME as "userName", U.USERALIAS as "userAlias", T.ROLE_ID as "roleId", R.ROLE_NAME as "roleName", R.ROLE_CODE as "roleCode", R.ROLE_TYPE as "roleType", R.FUNCTION_TYPE as "functionType" FROM TB_PRIV_USER_R_ROLE T INNER JOIN TB_PRIV_ROLE R ON T .ROLE_ID = R. ID INNER JOIN BG_SYS_USER U ON T .USER_ID = U .USERID WHERE T .VALID = '1' AND R.VALID = '1' AND U .VALID = '1' AND T.USER_ID=#{userId} AND R.FUNCTION_TYPE =#{type}
